title: Hamilton Beach Easy Access Programmable Coffee Maker 46300
description:
Front-access water reservoir & brew basket allow for easy filling
12 cup capacity
Programmable clock with 2 hour automatic shutoff 
Bold, regular & 1-4 cup brewing options 
Automatic pause & serve
Cleaning cycle reminder
Easy-view water window
Fits Hamilton Beach® 80674R water filter (sold separately)
Nonstick warming plate
Swing-out brew basket is easy to fill
On/off light
No-mess pouring
